channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Hidden Environmental Costs of Tech Giants’ AI Investments
item.description: Big tech is spending big on AI technologies. Training and operating them has raised concerns about environmental impact. What disclosures should susta...

item.title: Mexico Is Holding Back A Massive Wave Of Illegal Immigrants That Will Break After The Election
item.description: Here's what I learned walking among and interviewing a caravan of 1,000 migrants about Mexico's plans after Nov. 5.

item.title: The McReagan in the Election
item.description: The McReagan parable tells us a few things about our own past, and even about the policy that made that past worthy of a little nostalgia.

item.title: COVID-19 is no longer the world’s leading infectious disease killer
item.description: A longtime leading killer retakes the lead.

item.title: Judge sets hearing on $1 million-a-day sweepstakes from Elon Musk's PAC
item.description: A Philadelphia judge has set a hearing Thursday morning in the city prosecutor's bid to shut down Elon Musk's $1 million-a-day sweepstakes in battlegr...

item.title: YUGE Gift to the Clark Art Institute: Philanthropy at Its Best
item.description: 331 works of art and $45 million from a trustee’s estate will transform one of America’s best small museums.

item.title: Fox News Democracy '24: The keys to the count in every battleground state
item.description: Each of the seven swing states has unique rules affecting how and when votes are counted on Election Day.

item.title: Pennsylvania Democratic Party sues Erie County over 10,000-20,000 missing mail-in ballots
item.description: Pennsylvania's Democratic Party sued the Erie County Board of Elections on Wednesday over "numerous issues related to the mail-in voting process."

item.title: Oregon and Washington counties report ballot delivery issues with the U.S. Postal Service
item.description: Voters in two counties in Washington state and Oregon have not received mail-in ballots with less than a week to go before the election, election offi...

item.title: From Tweets to Trades: The Risks of Social Media in Investing
item.description: Are you able to step outside the confines of social media echo chambers to make informed investment decisions?

item.title: Two years ago, world leaders established a global Pandemic Fund. Now its co-chairs are warning it needs at least $2 billion by June
item.description: Due to the high demand in many countries, the Pandemic Fund will exhaust most of its funds by next June.

item.title: Jeff Bezos Is Right
item.description: The first step on the road to recovery is admitting that one has a problem.

item.title: Kamala Harris Won’t Win Gen Z Voters Like Me With Memes And Vibes
item.description: This is a presidential election, not a vote on who should be the next member of the Hype House.

item.title: Transhumanism Hasn’t Been The Paradise Mankind Thought It Would Be
item.description: If the long-awaited advent of the cyborg world is upon us, we will be forced to consider whether this is really what we want.

item.title: Wall Street’s Latest Flood: Private Credit
item.description: Private credit is a treacherous swamp full of opportunists. Is your consultant capable of defying the formidable odds of success?

item.description: A new report from a nonpartisan watchdog alleges that the Biden administration has fallen significantly short of its claim to be the most "transparent...

item.title: Ikea pledges €6 million to former prisoners of communist East Germany who were forced to build flat-pack furniture during the Cold War
item.description: “We deeply regret that this happened,” said Walter Kadnar, CEO of Ikea Germany.

item.title: Harris, Trump press their advantage on opposing sides of America's political gender divide
item.description: Donald Trump drafted NFL star Brett Favre to campaign with him in this electoral battleground and help solidify the former president's appeal with men...

item.title: Seven Lies Kamala Harris Packed Into 22-Minute Harrisburg Rally
item.description: Supporters spent more time finding decent parking than listening to their candidate speak.

item.title: Trump dons garbage worker's vest, jokes he may never wear blue suit jacket again

item.title: AI’s Game-Changing Potential in Banking: Are You Ready for the Regulatory Risks?
item.description: As regulators continue to refine their understanding of AI and big data, financial institutions have an opportunity to shape the regulatory landscape ...

item.title: Biden targeted in GOP resolution condemning 'garbage' remark about Trump supporters

item.title: After Years Of Dehumanizing Trumpers As Nazi Deplorables, Democrats’ ‘Garbage’ Walkbacks Ring Hollow
item.description: Democrats' problem isn't that their leader just said the quiet part out loud. It's that they've been so loud about their disdain for Trump supporters ...

item.title: The Call of Lovecraft
item.description: His work deserves to endure, as it certainly will. But not as a worldview unto itself.

item.title: Google Maps just got a fresh injection of AI features—here’s what you can do now
item.description: “We are entering a new era of maps,” Google Maps general manager Miriam Daniel said.

item.title: Unlocking Stock Market Success: Why You Should Embrace the Skew
item.description: By learning to appreciate positive skew and its associated tail events, investors can unlock the full potential of stock market gains.

item.title: The Incredible Shrinking Presidency
item.description: The powers of our tech billionaires will soon exceed those granted to our chief executive.
